title: Jase and Carly: Summer Lovin'
description: Book 1.5 in the Men Of Steel series This is the conclusion fo Jase and Carly's story. Tattooed bad boy Jase declared his love for Carly. But they will have to decide if love is enough, or if their relationship is only based on inescapable attraction. Do they have what it takes to make it to forever?
author: M.J. Fields
